Description: Bring up the complete EdX stack in a VPC.

EnvironmentTag.Description: A tag value applied to the hosts in the VPC indicating which environment to use during the configuration phase, e.g., stage, prod, sandbox

DeploymentTag.Description: A tag value applied to the hosts in the VPC indicating which deployment this is, e.g., edx, edge, <university>, <org>

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the web server

EdxappInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

WorkerInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

ForumInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

NotifierInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

MongoInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

CommonClusterInstanceType.Description: The instance type on which common, clustered applications, e.g., RabbitMQ and Elasticsearch are hosted.
CommonClusterInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

XserverInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

EdxappServerPort.Description: The TCP port for the Edxapp Server

XqueueServerPort.Description: The TCP port for the Xqueue server

XserverServerPort.Description: The TCP port for the XServer

ForumServerPort.Description: The TCP port for the Forum Server

CacheNodePort.Description: The TCP port for the nodes in the Elasticache cluster

SSLCertificateARN.Description: The ARN for an SSL certificate to use with the edxapp.

BastionInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

NATInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

EdxappDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the edxapp hosts

XServerDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the xserver hosts

CommonClusterDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the CommonCluster hosts

WorkerDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the celery worker hosts

ForumDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the forums hosts

NotifierDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the notifier hosts

MongoDesiredCapacity.Description: The Auto-scaling group desired capacity for the mongodb hosts

CacheNodeType.Description: The compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the Cache Cluster
CacheNodeType.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid Cache Node type.

NumberOfCacheNodes.Description: The number of Cache Nodes the Cache Cluster should have

DBName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBClass.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid database instance type.

DBEngineVersion.Description: Version of MySQL for the RDS
DBEngineVersion.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid database version.

MongoVolumeSize.Description: The size of the mongodb volumes(Gb). Because of RAID double the volume size will be available for mongo to use.

ClassB.Description: The second octet of the Class B to be allocated for this VPC. 10.?.xxx.xxx
ClassB.ConstraintDescription: ClassB value must be between 0 and 255.
